 1998-18561998-10-220FAIT,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign a TREATY ON MUTUAL ASSISTANCE IN CRIMINAL MATTERS between Canada and the Republic of PERU, or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing other officials to sign the Treaty on behalf of Canada.
